content.en: Sepsis prediction: Researchers are exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to predict the onset of sepsis, a life-threatening condition. These algorithms, such as InSight and the Artificial Intelligence Sepsis Expert, analyze electronic health record data and vital signs to identify patients at risk for sepsis. By detecting sepsis early, these algorithms have the potential to improve patient outcomes and save lives.
content.da: Sepsis-prediktion: Forskere undersøger brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige begyndelsen af sepsis, en livstruende tilstand. Disse algoritmer, såsom InSight og den kunstige intelligens Sepsis Expert, analyserer elektroniske sundhedsdata og vital tegn for at identificere patienter i risiko for sepsis. Ved at opdage sepsis tidligt har disse algoritmer potentiale til at forbedre patientresultater og redde liv.
